comment: We need to improve our order management efficiency. My team is available for a technical deep dive next week.
My manager asked me to find a solution for mapping our accounts payable process. We are on SAP S/4HANA and need a demo ASAP.
Just exploring process mining tools and wanted to understand your pricing and features compared to competitors.
I'm a student working on a project about process intelligence and would love to get a demo of your product for my research paper.
Saw your ad. Looks interesting. Tell me more.
Hi, we are evaluating process mining solutions to optimize our procure-to-pay cycle. We have over 5000 employees and use SAP. Can someone from sales contact us?
We are planning our budget for next year and are considering a process mining initiative. Could you send over some case studies for the manufacturing industry?
How does your software connect to custom-built CRM systems? We're looking into improving our customer journey process.
Our patient intake process has major bottlenecks. We need a way to visualize and fix them. Urgently looking for a solution.
